messages.message: What do most of our customers do with the original account they get given when they first install IB? - Do they use it as a service account?
You’re referring to that admin account right? Most customers don’t do anything with it. They leave it there as a backup account in case they want to log in as an admin at some point.
Yeah, that’s what I said. But I guess if they switch to SSO, that will also be lost right?
the account will still be there (the data isn’t deleted), you just can’t really login to access/use it.
OK, so what can we recommend they use as an admin account when they switch to SSO? Will one person just have to use their SSO credentials to be the overall admin
